pages.title: Moonstone Pedestal
pages.text: Your latest structure feels... somewhat lacking. And now you also know exactly what is missing: more $(c_white)Moonstone$(). The tricky part: Creating the required $(item)Moonstone Chiseled Blocks$() would require you being able to use your $(item)Moonstone Pedestal$() to it's full capability already.$(br)$(italic)Could there be a way to get around that?

pages.title: Checklist (Complete)
pages.text: $(li)1 Pigment Pedestal$(li)4 Onyx Chiseled Blocks$(li)4 Notched Polished Blocks$(li)8 Gemstone Lamps$(li)4 Gemstone Chiseled Blocks$(li)12 Polished Gemstone Blocks$(li)16 CMY Gemstone Chiseled Bl.$(li)28 Moonstone Chiseled Bl.$(li)36 Polished Pillars$(li)52 Polished Crests$(li)144 Polished Blocks
You can switch the basalt blocks with calcite and choose the gemstone blocks as you like it best. Mix up $(item)Calcite$() and $(item)Basalt$() up to create your personal variation!
